name: Alone: Cold Winter
storyline:
Lio P. Conen is a mentally unstable cop, that not only lost his work partner, but also got divorced from his wife.
There is still something that gives him a little bit of hope - his little daughter. However, one day he receives a message from his ex-wife telling him, that she wants to move to another town with her new husband and will take the daughter with her.

Frustrated about this situation, Lio tries to escape in alcoholism and drugs. When talking to his local dealer, he is given a new type of drug, that however is nothing ordinary. As it turns out it is the beginning of a wide spread conspirancy.
summary: Alone - Cold Winter is reimagination of Alone - Eternal Nightmare, which is a RPG-Maker action-horror game, that was heavily inspired by cult classics like Resident Evil, Silent Hill and Project Zero.
